Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
04.06.2013 AS, SCR#18140 changed alphanumeric parameters to WSC201 to Alpha to avoid cross-platform problems
06.06.2012 SH SCR17376 Step 2: Added BWSR_REPORTID_REQUEST/BWSR_REPORTID_REPLY
25.04.2012 SH SCR17277 Changed program logic for webservice type = 2 to achive calling of IBOL webservice multiple times
per bank account
19.04.2012 SH SCR17239 Added PI.TIME, PI.PID and deletion of TBWR rows
10.01.2012 SH SCR16851 Added update BWSR_MODE = 'I'
09.01.2012 AS SCR# 16851 Added webservice call to WSC201 and error handling
-- Reset variables
-- Create single BWSR row
-- Create multiple BWSR rows (one per bank account)
Only relevant if BPH361 is called from BPH300!
-- Virtual is set to False in case of any error in IBOL webservice call. Initially set to True to achieve deletion of TBWR row
in case of restart although everything worked OK before but program crashed after the webservice calls and before/within the
deletion of TBWR.
-- Finally if the IBOL webservice calls are performed for all selected BWSR rows (only one if BANK_WEBSERVICE_TYPE = 1 else
for multiple if BANK_WEBSERVICE_TYPE = 2 and > 1 bankaccouts exists for te selected bank) and no error occured delete
the TBWR row, which is used in BPH300 to trigger the call of BPH361.
-- Reset webservice output parameters / return codes
-- Call IBOL webservice
WSC201 failed. Notify operator(s) by email ...
-- Not if business error = E502 (Information that no statemnts are available)
Update the BWSR record which has been processed ...

ExpSyntax.val: 'Invocation of WSC201 failed with error=' & Trim(Str({0,27},'')) & ', error(call remote)=' & Trim(Str({0,17},''))

Text.val: -- E502 = information that no statemnts are available
possibly a re-run. reset error text. It worked now
IBOL business error ....
SOAP error ...
Call Remote failed ...
Send failed ...
any other error ....
-- In case of an error the trigger TBWR row has not to be deleted to achive starting the
webservice calls during the next BPH300 cycle
IBOL business info ....
